section.title: About Multiple Repositories
section.p: The JDBC driver was originally part of the main server distribution's source tree and was maintained there until the 8.0 release. Some members of the server's steering committee wanted to reduce the bulk of the package and their responsibility in maintaining the various non-server pieces. This resulted in all interfaces being removed from the server source tree. The JDBC driver moved to the gborg site. It is still developed by the same people, basically the only real change is a different cvs repository, which should be pretty low impact because I imagine most people just use pre-built jar files.
